Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Relates to establishing the manufacturing development zone program and tax credits related thereto
Summary: Relates to establishing the manufacturing development zone program and tax credits related thereto.
LawCode: Add Art 23 §§450 - 453, Ec Dev L; add §423-a, RPT L; amd §606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, the real property tax law and the tax law, in relation to the manufacturing development zone program and tax credits related thereto
